00042 //=====================================================================
00043 Core::Core(ITwitReply *obj)
00044 {
00045     m_subscriber = obj;
00046     m_eventLoop = new QEventLoop(this);
00047         m_http = new QHttp(TWITTER_HOST);
00048 
00049         MakeConnections();
00050 }
00051 //=====================================================================
00052 Core::~Core()
00053 {
00054     if(m_eventLoop)
00055         delete m_eventLoop;
00056     if(m_http)
00057         delete m_http;
00058 }
00059 //=====================================================================
00060 void Core::MakeConnections()   
00061 {
00062     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(dataReadProgress(int, int)), this, SLOT(DataReadProgress(int, int)));   
00063     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(requestStarted(int)), this, SLOT(RequestStarted(int)));
00064     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(requestFinished(int,bool)), this, SLOT(ReqFinished(int, bool)));
00065     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(done(bool)), this, SLOT(Done(bool)));
00066     connect(this, SIGNAL(QueryDone()), m_eventLoop, SLOT(quit()));
00067 }
00068 //=====================================================================
00069 void Core::Done ( bool error )
00070 {
00071     emit QueryDone();
00072 }
00073 //=====================================================================
00074 void Core::DataReadProgress ( int done, int total )
00075 {
00076     //m_subscriber->OnMessageReceived(QString::number(done).toStdString()+" / "+QString::number(total).toStdString());
00077 }
00078 //=====================================================================
00079 int Core::MakeGetRequest(QString req)
00080 {
00081     int reqId;
00082     QBuffer *tempBuffer = new QBuffer;
00083     tempBuffer->open(QIODevice::ReadWrite);
00084     reqId = m_http->get(req,tempBuffer);
00085     m_buffer[reqId] = tempBuffer;
00086 }
00087 //=====================================================================
00088 int Core::MakePostRequest(QString path,QByteArray req)
00089 {
00090     int reqId;
00091     QBuffer *tempBuffer = new QBuffer;
00092     tempBuffer->open(QIODevice::ReadWrite);
00093     reqId = m_http->post(path,req,tempBuffer);
00094     m_buffer[reqId] = tempBuffer;
00095 }
00096 //=====================================================================
00097 void Core::RequestStarted(int id)
00098 {}
00099 //=====================================================================
00100 void Core::ReqFinished(int id, bool error)
00101 {
00102     QByteArray resp;
00103     QHttpResponseHeader head;
00104     
00105     head = m_http->lastResponse();
00106     if(head.isValid())
00107         responseHeaderReceived(head);
00108      
00109     if(m_buffer[id])
00110         resp = m_buffer[id]->data();
00111      
00112     if(error)
00113     {
00114         m_subscriber->OnError(m_http->errorString().toStdString());
00115     }
00116     else if(id == m_loginId)
00117     {      
00118         m_credentialsId = MakeGetRequest(VERIFY_CREDENTIALS_URL);
00119     }
00120     else if(id == m_credentialsId)
00121     {
00122         QString buffer = QString(resp);
00123         if(buffer.contains("true"))
00124             m_subscriber->OnLoginStatus(true);
00125         else
00126             m_subscriber->OnLoginStatus(false);
00127     }
00128     else
00129     {
00130         m_subscriber->OnMessageReceived(QString(resp).toStdString());
00131     }
00132     
00133     if(m_buffer[id])
00134     {
00135         m_buffer[id]->close();
00136         delete m_buffer[id];
00137         m_buffer[id] = NULL;
00138     }
00139 }
00140 //=====================================================================
00141 void Core::responseHeaderReceived(const QHttpResponseHeader &resp)
00142 {
00143         switch(resp.statusCode())
00144         {
00145                 case SERVER::OK:
00146             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::OK);
00147                         break;
00148                 case SERVER::NOT_MODIFIED:
00149             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::NOT_MODIFIED);
00150                         break;
00151                 case SERVER::BAD_REQUEST:
00152             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::BAD_REQUEST);
00153                         break;
00154                 case SERVER::NOT_AUTHORIZED:
00155             m_subscriber->OnLoginStatus(false);
00156             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::NOT_AUTHORIZED);
00157                         break;
00158                 case SERVER::FORBIDDEN:
00159             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::FORBIDDEN);
00160                         break;
00161                 case SERVER::NOT_FOUND:
00162             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::NOT_FOUND);
00163                         break;
00164                 case SERVER::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR:
00165             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);
00166                         break;
00167                 case SERVER::BAD_GATEWAY:
00168             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::BAD_GATEWAY);
00169                         break;
00170                 case SERVER::SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE:
00171             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE);
00172                         break;
00173                 default:
00174             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::UNKNOWN);
00175                         break;
00176         }
00177 }

00186 {

00189     req.replace("[req-id]",id);

00191     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00192 }

00224 void Core::GetUsersTimeline(SERVER::Option2 *opt  /*=NULL*/)
00225 {
00226     QString buildUrl = USERS_TIMELINE_URL;
00227     
00228     if(opt)
00229     {
00230         QString user        = opt->user.c_str();
00231         QString count      = QString::number(opt->count);
00232         QString since       = opt->since.c_str();
00233         QString sinceId    = QString::number(opt->sinceId);
00234         QString page       = QString::number(opt->page);
00235         
00236         if(!user.isEmpty())
00237             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","/"+user);
00238         else
00239             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00240         
00241         buildUrl += "?count="+count;
00242         buildUrl += "&since="+since;
00243         buildUrl += "&since_id="+sinceId;
00244         buildUrl += "&page="+page;
00245     }
00246     else
00247     {
00248         buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00249     }
00250 
00251     MakeGetRequest(buildUrl);
00252     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00253 }
00254 //=====================================================================
00255 void Core::GetFavorites(QString user  /*=""*/, int page  /*=1*/)
00256 {
00257     QString buildUrl  = GET_FAVORITES_URL;
00258     
00259     if(!user.isEmpty())
00260         buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","/"+user);
00261     else
00262         buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00263     
00264     buildUrl += "?page="+page;
00265     
00266     MakeGetRequest(buildUrl);    
00267     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00268 }

00275     {       
00276         QString since       = opt->since.c_str();

00278         QString count      = QString::number(opt->count);
00279         QString page       = QString::number(opt->page);
00280         
00281         buildUrl += "?since="+since;
00282         buildUrl += "&since_id="+sinceId;
00283         buildUrl += "&count="+count;
00284         buildUrl += "&page="+page;
00285     }
00286 
00287     MakeGetRequest(buildUrl);
00288     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);

00291 void Core::PostNewStatus(QString status)
00292 {
00293     QByteArray encodedUrl, req;
00294     encodedUrl = QUrl::toPercentEncoding(status);
00295     
00296     req = "status=";
00297     req += encodedUrl;
00298     
00299     MakePostRequest(POST_NEW_STATUS_URL,req);
00300     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);

00332 void Core::GetFriends(SERVER::Option4 *opt  /*=NULL*/)

00335     
00336     if(opt)

00338         QString user        = opt->user.c_str();

00340         QString lite          = opt->lite ? "true" : "false";
00341         QString since       = opt->since.c_str();

00343         if(!user.isEmpty())
00344             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","/"+user);
00345         else
00346             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00347

00349         buildUrl += "&lite="+lite;
00350         buildUrl += "&since="+since;

00435 //=====================================================================
00436 void Core::SendDirectMessage(QString user, QString text)
00437 {
00438     QByteArray encodedText, req;
00439     encodedText = QUrl::toPercentEncoding(text);
00440     
00441     req = "user=";
00442     req += user.toAscii();
00443     req += "&";
00444     req += "text=";
00445     req += encodedText;
00446     
00447     MakePostRequest(SEND_NEW_DIRECT_MESSAGE_URL,req);
00448     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00449 }

00509 //=====================================================================
00510 void Core::UpdateDeliveryDevice(SERVER::DEVICES device)
00511 {
00512     QString buildUrl = UPDATE_DELIVERY_DEVICE;
00513 
00514     switch(device)
00515     {
00516         case SERVER::SMS:
00517             buildUrl += "?device=sms";
00518             break;
00519         case SERVER::IM:
00520             buildUrl += "?device=im";
00521            break;
00522         case SERVER::NONE:
00523             buildUrl += "?device=none";
00524             break;
00525     }
00526     
00527     MakeGetRequest(buildUrl);
00528     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00529 }
